mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS stat_day, CASE WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 0 AND 100000 THEN '1' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000 THEN '2' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 200000 AND 300000 THEN '3' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 300000 AND 400000 THEN '4' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 400000 AND 500000 THEN '5' ELSE 'O' END AS a_stat, COUNT(DISTINCT ctn) AS b_stat, COUNT(*) AS c_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'B' THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) AS d_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'R' OR TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'C' THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) AS e_stat, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'B' THEN TOTAL WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'R' OR TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'C' THEN -TOTAL ELSE 0 END) AS f_stat, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ctn) > 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'B' THEN TOTAL ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(DISTINCT ctn) ELSE 0 END AS g_stat FROM TB_API_LOGS WHERE TRANSACTION_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), CASE WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 0 AND 100000 THEN '1' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000 THEN '2' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 200000 AND 300000 THEN '3' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 300000 AND 400000 THEN '4' WHEN TOTAL BETWEEN 400000 AND 500000 THEN '5' ELSE 'O' END
